channel.title: 2018 on R-Ladies Global
channel.description: Recent content in 2018 on R-Ladies Global

item.title: What happened in 2018?
item.description: Retrospective 2018 Include IWD 2018 R-Ladies growth LatinR Conferences Blog posts

item.title: vacation <- grow(RLadiesNetwork)
item.description: We would like to tell you how one vacation lead to growth of R Ladies community in South America. The story involves multiple countries and crossing paths at the right time in life.

item.title: 3. Behind the scenes of R-Ladies IWD2018 Twitter action!
item.description: As told by Page and Sheila On March the 8th, International Women’s Day, we ran a continuous feed of awesome R-Ladies profiles from our directory via @rladies_iwd2018. It was a blast!

item.title: 2. Behind the scenes of R-Ladies IWD2018 Twitter action!
item.description: As told by Kelly O’Briant On March the 8th, International Women’s Day, we ran a continuous feed of awesome R-Ladies profiles from our directory via @rladies_iwd2018. It was a blast! And a lot of team work too!

item.title: 1. Behind the scenes of R-Ladies IWD2018 Twitter action!
item.description: As told by Maëlle Salmon with notes from Bea Hernández On March the 8th, International Women’s Day, we ran a continuous feed of awesome R-Ladies profiles from our directory via @rladies_iwd2018.
